description: This version of our signature button-down is cut from an ultrathin layer of our most lightweight cotton mesh, making it the perfect shirt for transitional days or when you want a comfortable layer underneath sweaters or jackets.
fitting_details: Size Big 2X has a 32" body length, a 22" shoulder, a 28" chest, and a 36½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Size Tall 2L has a 35" body length, a 22" shoulder, a 28" chest, and a 38½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes ¾" between sizes.
Long sleeves with buttoned barrel cuffs.
Split back yoke with a box pleat ensures a comfortable fit and a greater range of motion.
Signature embroidered pony at the left chest.
